## Issues Found

### 1. Typo in Error Message (noted in lib/BUGS.md)

The "unknow type" typo in sequence error messages is documented in `lib/BUGS.md` as it's in `lib/sequence.php`.

## Code Quality Notes

- Impressive collection of 60+ mathematical sequence types
- Well-organized with types/, actions/, build/ subdirectories
- Clean separation between sequence definition and execution
- Flag system for sequence properties is elegant

The sequence module is one of the more sophisticated parts of PAD.
